course_description: The primary goal is the guided development of a research proposal, based on the student's research project. Specific aims include careful planning for "proof-of-principle" experiments leading to the second-year research report, and building proposal development skills to prepare for the thirdyear and fourth-year proposal requirements
sections: Class Nbr: 6041, Section #: 1, Type: SUP, Campus: ATL, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: K. Salaita, Status: Open
